attributes.action: Charge illegal immigrants especially ones who deliberately destroy their i.d,and prosecute the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: breakers.How come instead of zero tolerance these people are rewarded with free taxpayer paid for accomodation and benefits. as a native I risk fines from the greedy government,every time I leave the house.Parking  speeding  smoking litter car tax fines the list is endless.And the authorities are ruthless,no excuses accepted,Please explain why illegal immmigrants are exempt from prosecution

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
